name: updateNetworkCellularGatewayDhcp
description: Update common DHCP settings of MGs

dhcpLeaseTime.description: DHCP Lease time for all MG of the network. Possible values are '30 minutes', '1 hour', '4 hours', '12 hours', '1 day' or '1 week'.

dnsCustomNameservers.description: list of fixed IPs representing the the DNS Name servers when the mode is 'custom'

dnsNameservers.description: DNS name servers mode for all MG of the network. Possible values are: 'upstream_dns', 'google_dns', 'opendns', 'custom'.

$ul: **dhcpLeaseTime**: DHCP Lease time for all MG in the network.
**dnsCustomNameservers**: List of fixed IPs representing the the DNS Name servers when the mode is 'custom'.
**dnsNameservers**: DNS name servers mode for all MG in the network.
